tool.name: CGP Run Assembly
tool.description: Run assembler programs Velvet, Newbler, AMOS. Input files can be sff, fastq, and fasta. *.fasta.qual files are considered as the relevant quality files
tool.help:

**CGP:Run Assembly**

run_assembly input.sff [, input2.sff, ... inputN.fastq, ... inputM.fasta] [-o output.fasta] [-R references.mfa] [-t tempdir] Input files can be sff, fastq, and fasta. *.fasta.qual files are considered as the relevant quality files
